description.value: Like many humans raised in a close-knit community, you have always been strongly attuned to the presence of others. Willing allies that you are aware of within 60 feet that would otherwise be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected]{Undetected} by you are instead @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden]{Hidden} from you. The flat check for you to target willing allies within 60 feet that are hidden from you is @Check[type:flat|dc:5]{DC 5} instead of 11.
